name: hellekindset
notes:
as of january 2026, the free version of this pattern is no longer available. 

hellekindset beanie features a norwegian orange blossom motif and matches the [seville](/patterns/library/seville-8) wristers. 

the yardage breakdown is as follows: 

main colour (white) 85m/93 yards 
contrast colour 1 (pink) 85m/93 yards 
contrast colour 2 (magenta) 20m/22 yards  

the pompom used an additional 45m/50 yards.

oppskriften er også tilgjengelig på norsk.
